Actually from the movie it looks like rock with metallic outposts.

and the NORMAL beast wars/Beast Machines size is a fraction of a G1
transformer. It wasn't til after Primal and Megatron merged with their
counter parts sparks did they grow to G1 size. Is it normal for them to be
that size? NO IT'S NOT. The biggest BW/BM transformer possible under normal
circumstances is under bumble bee size. Even in their original transmetal
bodies megatron/primal weren't even the size of optimus primes head and they
were two of the bigger (rinox/Rampage being the largest, but again proto
form X was hardly normal system specs) bots on the show. Rat Trap is like a
flea to an original transformer in size terms.










----- Original Message -----
From: <Legendarynemasis@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 06, 2002 9:21 PM
Subject: Re: G1


> Cybertrons Moons were Cybernetic... not rock. And as for the TFs being a
> fraction of a G1 transformers size that is fault. On Average TF
Transformers
> ranged anywhere from 8 feet to 40- 60 feet tall normaly, with some
> exceptions. The size range of BW transformers ranged from 4 feet- Original
> Rattrap to about 20 feet, Optimus Primal(ultra version) and Megatron(ultra
> T-Rex and TM2 Dragon.) Optimal Optimus was the size of a G1 bot.
